titleStmt.title: A new postil conteinyng most godly and learned sermons vpon all the Sonday Gospelles, that be redde in the church thorowout the yeare ...
titleStmt.author: Becon, Thomas, 1512-1567.

publicationStmt.publisher: In Flete-strete nere to S. Dunstons church, by Thomas Marshe [and John Kingston],

notesStmt.note: Becon's name appears in the heading to the preface.
John Kingston printed gatherings 2A-2H in the second part (STC).
In two parts, the second with separate foliation and register.
Reproduction of the original in University of Chicago. Library.
